e I've got is that the diff

A niggle you can scratch.. just set the AnkhSVN config file to us=
e a
third party diff tool:
http://www.nabble.com/External-Diff-td5358541.ht=
ml#a5359335
(http://www.google.com/search?q=3Dankhsvn+external+diff+tool)

=
tortoisesvn.tigris.org has a great diff/merge tool, or you also have
the mo=
re specialised winmerge.org which is better in situations when

ing something very complex, but you will probably want

ed anyway since it very convenient sometimes to

ile explorer.
